Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which holds significant value for us and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Our product is priced at $1,350,000, reflecting its true worth and the unique opportunities it offers. I understand its value to you is $1,200,000, and I hope this offer presents an attractive proposition. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to discuss the details of the product in more depth. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
